price: ߏ߬ ߞߐ߫ ߊ߬ߟߎ߫ ߞߵߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߞߐߘߏ߲߬ ߞߵߊ߬ ߝߐ߫ ߞߴߏ߬ ߦߋ߫ ( ߡߐ߰ ) ߟߊߓߌ߬ߟߊ߬ߣߍ߲߫ ߝߊ߬ߕߐ ߘߏ߫ ߟߋ߬ ߘߌ߫
arabic: ثُمَّ تَوَلَّوۡاْ عَنۡهُ وَقَالُواْ مُعَلَّمٞ مَّجۡنُونٌ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: thumma tawallaw ʿanhu waqālū muʿallamun majnūnun
